nodes.text: Flight suits, also spelled as flightsuits or otherwise known as jumpsuits, were a type of outfit worn by pilots. They were worn in junction with flight helmets. Due to the dangerous nature of some piloting occupations, some starfighter pilots wore EVA suits. They came in different colors such as blue, green, and even red after the Fall of the Empire. Although the most common color was orange, being worn by Red, Green, and Gold Squadrons.[source?]

On October 29, 2014, for a Halloween-themed update, a costume of a Rebellion flight suit was added to The Sims 4 for playable Sims to wear in-game. The costume is purely cosmetic and offers no gameplay changes.
